short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist weather extension for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just the weather! 

Displays the weather for your current city, including the daily maximum, minimum, and current temperature. 

On input, discover weather data for over 200,000 cities around the world!
